text:
that suddenly get worse. When this happens, you have a much harder time catching your breath. Symptoms that worsen suddenly can include sudden chest tightness, more coughing, a change in your sputum (mucus), or fever. Your doctor will look at things that may be causing these sudden symptoms. Sometimes the symptoms are caused by a lung infection.",NIHSeniorHealth,COPD
What is (are) COPD ?,"More information on COPD is available at:  What is COPD? and at the  Learn More, Breathe Better Campaign  Fo
